name: Basic Spin
description: A simple, smooth single spin where the leader raises the follower’s hand to guide a controlled turn while maintaining forward momentum. One of the most common and essential turns in Sokkie.
tips: Leaders: lift the hand just enough for clearance and keep the turn gentle. Followers: keep your core engaged and finish the spin facing your partner.

name: Cuddle Position Turn
description: Leader guides the follower into a wrapped 'cuddle' position before unwinding back to open position.
tips: Maintain gentle frame and don’t over-rotate the wrap; keep it relaxed and controlled.

name: Tornado
description: A fast rotational move where the leader guides the follower into a tight series of spins while maintaining smooth travelling momentum. Common in energetic Sokkie socials and used to add flair during quick songs.
tips: Keep your travelling line steady and frame relaxed. Leaders should signal early; followers should keep steps small to stay balanced during the spin.
